label: Private Investigation Services
description: Services related to private investigation, including surveillance, lie detector tests, and tracing debtors.

subcategories.label: Surveillance
subcategories.description: Monitoring and observing individuals or groups for investigative purposes.

subcategories.label: Lie Detector Tests
subcategories.description: Tests that measure physiological responses to determine the truthfulness of a statement.

subcategories.label: Debtor Tracing
subcategories.description: Locating individuals who owe money or have disappeared.
